Docs.summary: This class is used to specify meta information of a TV input.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsHidden(class Android.Content.Context context) cil managed

Docs.param: Supplies a Context used to check if this TV input is hidden.
Docs.summary: Checks if this TV input is marked hidden by the user in the settings.
Docs.returns: true if the user marked this TV input hidden in settings. false otherwise.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Android.Graphics.Drawables.Drawable LoadIcon(class Android.Content.Context context) cil managed

Docs.param: Supplies a Context used to load the icon.
Docs.summary: Loads the user-displayed icon for this TV input.
Docs.returns: a Drawable containing the TV input's icon. If the TV input does not have an icon, application's icon is returned. If it's unavailable too, null is returned.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
